entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 27.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning before morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 40 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
